name: Nice Regular Show Theme (Tumblr)
description:
A basic and clean looking Regular Show theme, featuring 'Mordecai and Rigby', a custom Tumblr logo, and a 'Cartoon Network' scroll to top button! 

Follow me on Tumblr: http://www.carlycats.tumblr.com/
